sentence: Its not sufficient David Perdue, a former senator, looks like hes going to lose to the incumbent governor of Georgia, Brian Kemp, in next weeks primary, despite his support for the big lie? but it makes a difference.
title: Its Trumps Party, and Hell Lie if He Wants To

sentence: In the Georgia primary for governor, a Trump surrogate, Sonny Purdue, is polling well behind Mr. Trumps nemesis, the incumbent Brian Kemp.
title: Democrats, the Midterm Jinx Is Not Inevitable

sentence: Under the once-in-a-decade redistricting process, Georgias Republican governor, Brian Kemp, signed into law a new map that transformed Ms. McBaths district to favor Republicans overwhelmingly.
title: Two Democratic Congresswomen, One Redrawn Georgia District
Kemp notches huge primary win in Georgia
